small.comment: Default border radius for small buttons. Using Tailwind sm variant
small.name: rounded-sm

base.comment: Default border radius for primary buttons. Using Tailwind lg variant.
base.name: rounded

medium.comment: For compatibility purposes, add in medium which is the same as base.
medium.name: rounded-md

large.comment: Default border radius for dashlets. Using Tailwind 2xl variant.
large.name: rounded-lg

x-large.comment: Default border radius for main elements of application. Using Tailwind 3xl variant.
x-large.name: rounded-xl

full.comment: Rounded border radius for text fields.
full.name: rounded-full
